thread.title: Harry Kane reveals Dele Alli NUTMEGGED him the first time he ever met him
thread.title_full: Harry Kane reveals Dele Alli NUTMEGGED him the first time he ever met him

author: Mark Jones
title: Harry Kane reveals Dele Alli NUTMEGGED him the first time he ever met him
text:
Sport Harry Kane reveals Dele Alli NUTMEGGED him the first time he ever met him The Spurs pair are seen by a lot of people as the future of English football, but the first time they ever met there was only one winner Share They're mates now (Photo: Reuters) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
There has been the odd wobble here and there, but by and large Tottenham are having a fine season. 
And key to the efforts of Mauricio Pochettino's team have been the dynamic duo of Harry Kane and Dele Alli , both of whom also look vitally important to England's progress over the coming years. 
But things weren't always as harmonious between the pair as they are on the pitch right now. Tottenham's dynamic duo weren't always this close (Photo: Clive Rose) Most Spurs shirts come with one of these two names on the back these days (Photo: Getty) 
Because in an interview with Soccer AM, Kane has revealed that Alli was certainly very sure of himself when the pair first met. 
“When he first came to Spurs we were training and he was young and had just come from MK Dons,” said the forward. 
“I weren’t expecting it but he ‘megged me. I lost my head a bit and tried to take him out thinking ‘Who’s this young player coming in and nutmegging me?’ "Don't do that again Dele" (Photo: Reuters) 
“I chased him round for a few minutes but I didn’t want to get nutmegged again so just stayed up front!” 
Good idea Harry. 
Sadly for Alli's Premier League opponents, they don't have that luxury. 
Now wave for the nice people. Like us on Facebook
